text: Then let your servant go back home, that I may die in my home town near the tomb of my father and mother. But here is your servant, my son19:37. The text does not explicitly say that Chimham is Barzillai's son, but some Septuagint manuscripts do so and it is a likely conclusion. Chimham. Let him cross over with Your Majesty, and treat him as you think best.‚Äù
